content:
If there’s NOT a special notice in the description, all the ORIGINAL works are all rights reserved. The copyright and its related rights belong to their creators. You may not re-post these works without a permission. This restriction also applies to this Notice.
For works that used CC License, you must follow the license terms.
For example, here’s the summary of CC-BY-SA 4.0 International License:
 “
You are free to:
Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format
Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.
The licensor cannot revoke these freedoms as long as you follow the license terms.
Under the following terms:
Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.
ShareAlike — If you remix, transform, or build upon the material, you must distribute your contributions under the same license as the original.
No additional restrictions — You may not apply legal terms or technological measures that legally restrict others from doing anything the license permits.
”
 For works that in the public domain, you can use them, re-create them (etc.) for any purpose. Even if you use them for COMMERCIAL USES. You don’t even have to give a credit for it.
For works that re-posted, the copyright belonging to its creator. Most of the re-posted works are under a permission of the original creators, or licensed under a CC License.
If not, it means it’s an unpermitted work. If you’re the creator of it, please contact us to talk about remove it or give a permission to it. I’ll reply it in 24h.
Thank you!
summary: The copyright notice of this site.
title: Copyright Notice

content:
Contents Usage Blog Framework  Hugo by the Hugo Authors.  Theme  hugo-PaperMod by adityatelange.  based on hugo-paper by nanxiaobei.    Icons  “bilibili-line” icon by Meiky_Ou on iconfont. “CN_csdn.net” icon by Lwanz on iconfont. “抖音” icon by qqavh147 on iconfont. “快手” icon by qqavh147 on iconfont. “lofter” icon by Murtha on iconfont. “zhihu” icon by 梦宝宝smile on iconfont. Segmentfault Free Icon by Distriarte Publicidad on OnlineWebFonts.COM.  References Blog Building  Hugo Documentation 浅谈我为什么从 HEXO 迁移到 HUGO by UncleFish on 少数派. Hugo 不完美教程 - VI: Multilingual 多语言支持 by 坚果jimbowhy on 简书. Hugo增加多语言支持 by Allen Yuan on their personal blog 博客. Installation | Update by adityatelange on the branch site of his personal blog Aditya Telange. GitHub + Hugo 搭建个人博客 by Keith Mo on their personal blog Haunted Hovel - 闹鬼小屋. Hugo部署与踩坑记 by Aozaki on their personal blog Aozaki&rsquo;s Note.  And so many articles.
 Thanks for the high-quality content provided by the above staff!
On behalf of this site, I salute you all!
summary: Thanks for the great contributions of these staff!
title: Special Thanks
